text: a akramikal tannal netiveccatinekkuricceartt peticcu virakkunnat ninakku kanam. avarilat vannettuka tanne ceyyum. ennal satyavisvasam svikarikkukayum salkkarmannal pravarttikkukayum ceytavar urappayum svargiyaramannalilayirikkum. avarkk tannalute nathanreyatutt avaragrahikkunnateakke kittum. atu tanneyan atimahattaya anugraham
